On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how positive and negative have you felt this morning?

On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this morning?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this afternoon?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this evening?

On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how confident are you about your assessment of your friend?
